description:
CSP Daily News mobile app provides breaking convenience and petroleum retailing channel industry news, complete daily coverage and insightful analysis for business decision-makers whenever and wherever they need it – all from their mobile!

Browse CSP Daily News headlines and read full articles both online and off, and watch videos from CSPTV, CSP’s online news video program.  All articles and video segments can be e-mailed and shared via social networks such as Twitter and Facebook.

Quick, easy, instant access to the top c-store headlines daily. Simple to navigate – easy to read content in categories including:
•	Top Stories
•	Petroleum
•	Tobacco
•	Foodservice
•	Beverages
•	Snacks & Candy 
•	General Merchandising
•	Technology
•	Services
•	Financial
•	CSPTV

CSP Information Group, publisher of CSP, Fare, FoodService Director & Restaurant Business magazines, is a B2B communication company specializing in the convenience retailing, restaurant & on-the-go food industries.
